entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect IDE0059 in a local function : Unnecessary assignment of a value #58407
  • Use implicit/explicit type doesn't work with lambda function types #58404

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix "Build Only" diagnostics content in error list #58409
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Fix leak in _hostAnalyzerStateMap #58406
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Nullable analysis for Conditional/ObjectCreation conversions working through a delegates. #58405
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only
  • Rename options refactoring #58403
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58402
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Remove weakref that telemetry indicates has no impact at all. #57803
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Move component model code to common location for all AbstractPackages #58397
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #58412
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • IDE code generator service refactoring #58244
    Area-IDE
  • Update Public API files #41000
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Null Annotations
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers
  • Call InitializeTelemetrySession on background thread #58399
    Area-IDE
  • Remove OptionSet and Workspace from IVSTypeScriptInlineRenameInfo #58381
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Simplify how our FatalError type works and introduce a severity concept #58094
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, UX Review Not Required
